confirm.expired_confirm: <red><prefix>Confirmation has expired, please run the command again!
confirm.failed_confirm: <red><prefix>You have no pending actions to confirm!
confirm.requires_confirm:
<aqua><prefix>Are you sure you wish to execute: <gold><command><gray>?
<red>This cannot be undone! If you are sure: <gray><value>
<gray>The request times out in <red><timeout><gray> seconds.
move.move_merged: <red><prefix>Merged plots may not be moved. Please unmerge the plot before performing the move.
area.set_pos2: You will now set pos2: <command>. Note: The chosen plot size may result in the created area not exactly matching your second position.
web.plot_merged: <red><prefix>This plot is merged and therefore cannot be downloaded
web.generating_link_failed: <red><prefix>Failed to generate download link for plot <plot>!
web.generation_link_success:
<green><prefix>Download: <gray><click:open_url:'<download>'><download></click> 
 Deletion: <gray><click:open_url:'<delete>'><delete></click>
<red>Attention: Opening the deletion link will delete the file immediately.
web.load_null: <aqua><prefix>Please use <dark_aqua><command> <gray>to get a list of schematics.
cluster.cluster_outside: <aqua><prefix>The proposed area is outside the plot area: <area>
cluster.cluster_invited: <green><prefix>You have been invited to the following cluster: <gray><cluster>.
cluster.cluster_kicked_user: <green><prefix>Successfully kicked the user from the cluster.
cluster.cluster_not_added: <aqua><prefix>That player was not added to the plot cluster.
cluster.cluster_cannot_leave: <red><prefix>You must delete or transfer ownership before leaving the cluster.
cluster.cluster_added_helper: <green><prefix>Successfully added a helper to the cluster.
cluster.cluster_removed_helper: <green><prefix>Successfully removed a helper from the cluster.
border.denied: <red><prefix>You are outside the current map border.
border.bypass.exited: <red><prefix>You have bypassed the current map border area.
border.bypass.entered: <aqua><prefix>You have re-entered the current map border area.
height.height_limit: <green><prefix>This plot area has building height limits: Min height: <gray><minheight><gold>, Max height: <gray><maxheight>
swap.swap_overlap: <red><prefix>The proposed areas are not allowed to overlap.
swap.swap_merged: <red><prefix>Merged plots may not be swapped. Please unmerge the plots before performing the swap.
comment.invalid_inbox:
<aqua><prefix>That is not a valid inbox.
<gold>Accepted values: <list>
comment.no_perm_inbox: <red><prefix>You do not have permission for that inbox.
comment.no_perm_inbox_modify: <red><prefix>You do not have permission to modify that inbox.
comment.no_plot_inbox: <red><prefix>You must stand in or supply a plot argument
console.not_console: <red><prefix>For safety reasons, this command can only be executed by console.
console.is_console: <red><prefix>This command can only be executed by a player.
blockedcmds.command_blocked: <red><prefix>That command is not allowed in this plot.
done.done_already_done: <aqua><prefix>This plot is already marked as done.
done.done_not_done: <aqua><prefix>This plot is not marked as done.
done.done_insufficient_complexity: <red><prefix>This plot is too simple. Please add more detail before using this command.
done.done_removed: <aqua><prefix>You may now continue building in this plot.
done.building_restricted: <aqua><prefix>You can't build on plots marked as done.
ratings.rating_not_valid: <red><prefix>You need to specify a number between 1 and 10.
ratings.rating_not_owned: <red><prefix>You cannot rate a plot that is not claimed by anyone.
economy.vault_or_consumer_null: <red><prefix>Economy isn't initialized. Make sure Vault and an economy service plugin are installed.
economy.cannot_afford_plot: <red><prefix>You cannot afford to buy this plot. It costs <gold><money>. You have <gold><balance>.
economy.plot_sold: <green><prefix>Your plot, <gold><plot>, has been sold to <gold><player> for <gold><price>.
economy.cannot_afford_merge: <red><prefix>You cannot afford to merge the plots. It costs <gold><money>.
economy.cannot_buy_blocked: <red><prefix>You are not allowed to buy this plot.
setup.setup_finished: <green><prefix>You should have been teleported to the created world. Otherwise you will need to set the generator manually using the bukkit.yml or your chosen world management plugin.
setup.setup_world_taken: <aqua><prefix><value> <red>is already a world. Choose a different name.
setup.setup_world_name: <green><prefix>What do you want your world to be called?
setup.setup_world_name_error: <red><prefix>You need to choose a world name!
setup.setup_world_type:
<green><prefix>What world type do you want?
<dark_gray> - <dark_green>normal<dark_gray> - <gray>Standard plot generation
<dark_gray> - <dark_green>augmented<dark_gray> - <gray>Plot generation with terrain
<dark_gray> - <dark_green>partial<dark_gray> - <gray>Vanilla with clusters of plots
setup.setup_wrong_generator: <red><prefix>The specified generator does not identify as BukkitPlotGenerator<dark_gray> - <dark_green>You may need to manually configure the other plugin.
setup.setup_world_apply_plotsquared: <red><prefix>The world you specified already exists. After restarting, new terrain will use <gold>PlotSquared<red>, however you may need to reset the world for it to generate correctly!
setup.setup_partial_area:
<green><prefix>What terrain would you like in plots?
<dark_gray> - <dark_green>ROAD<dark_gray> - <gray>Terrain separated by roads
<dark_gray> - <dark_green>ALL<dark_gray> - <gray>Entirely vanilla generation
setup.setup_area_name: <green><prefix>What would you like this area called?
setup.setup_area_invalid_id: <red><prefix>You must choose an area id that is not in use!
setup.setup_area_min_plot_id: <green><prefix>What should be the minimum Plot ID?
setup.setup_area_min_plot_id_error: <red><prefix>You must choose a valid minimum Plot ID!
setup.setup_area_max_plot_id: <green><prefix>What should be the maximum Plot ID?
setup.setup_area_max_plot_id_error: <red><prefix>You must choose a valid maximum Plot ID!
setup.setup_area_plot_id_greater_than_mi: <red><prefix>The maximum Plot ID must be greater than the minimum!
setup.plot_block: <gold>Plot block<gray> (Block(s) to fill the plot with from Y0 to the defined plot height (Set in a previous step))
setup.top_block_boolean: <gold>Whether a layer of blocks should be put on top of the plot block
setup.plot_block_floor: <gold>Plot floor block<gray> (One layer of blocks put on top of the plot block)
setup.top_wall_block: <gold>Top wall block<gray> (Block(s) shaping the border of an unclaimed plot)
setup.wall_block_claimed: <gold>Wall block (claimed)<gray> (Block(s) shaping the border of a claimed plot)
setup.wall_filling_block: <gold>Wall filling block<gray> (Block(s) been put under the plot border down to min gen height + 1)
setup.min_gen_height: <gold>Minimum height from which to generate (for 1.18+ can be negative).
setup.bedrock_boolean: <gold>Whether a bedrock layer under the plot should be generated or not
setup.component_below_bedrock_boolean: <gold>Whether a component change e.g. /plot set walls should edit the bedrock layer or below
schematics.schematic_too_large: <red><prefix>The plot is too large for this action!
schematics.schematic_size_mismatch: <red><prefix>The schematic's size does not match the plot's. If you want to paste anyway, enable schematics.paste-mismatches in settings.yml
schematics.schematic_invalid: <red><prefix>That is not a valid schematic. Reason: <gray><reason>.
schematics.schematic_invalid_named: <red><prefix><schemname> is not a valid schematic. Reason: <gray><reason>.
schematics.schematic_paste_merged: <red><prefix>Schematics cannot be pasted onto merged plots. Please unmerge the plot before performing the paste.
reload.reloaded_configs: <green><prefix>Translations and world settings have been reloaded successfully.
alias.alias_too_long: <red><prefix>The alias must have less than 50 characters in length.
position.position_set: <green><prefix>Home position set to your current location.
position.position_unset: <green><prefix>Home position reset to the default location.
permission.no_schematic_permission: <red><prefix>You don't have the permission required to use schematic <gold><value><red>.
permission.no_plot_perms: <red><prefix>You must be the plot owner to perform this action.
permission.cant_transfer_more_plots: <red><prefix>You can't send more plots to that user.
permission.cant_claim_more_plots_num: <red><prefix>You can't claim more than <gold><amount> plots at once.
merge.merge_not_valid: <aqua><prefix>This merge request is no longer valid.
merge.no_available_automerge: <red><prefix>You do not own any adjacent plots in the specified direction or are not allowed to merge to the required size.
commandconfig.flag_tutorial_usage: <red><prefix>The plot flag <gold><flag><red> is not set preventing you from performing this action.
invalid.component_illegal_block: <red><prefix>You are not allowed to generate a component containing the block <gray><value>
invalid.not_valid_number: <red><prefix>That's not a valid number within the range: <gray><value>
invalid.origin_cant_be_target: <red><prefix>The origin and target location cannot be the same.
invalid.found_no_plots: <red><prefix>Found no plots with your search query.
invalid.number_not_in_range: <red><prefix>That's not a valid number within the range: <gray>(<min>, <max>)
condense.task_complete: <green><prefix>Task complete. Please verify that no new plots have been claimed during the task.
condense.eta: <green><prefix>Estimated time: No idea, times will drastically change based on the system performance and load.
condense.radius_measured: <yellow> - Radius is measured in plot width.
database.conversion_failed: <red><prefix>Failed to insert plot objects, see stacktrace for info.
database.failed_to_save_plots: <red><prefix>Failed to save plots, read stacktrace for info.
database.invalid_args: <red><prefix>Please make sure you are using the correct arguments.
database.failed_to_open: <red><prefix>Failed to open connection, read stacktrace for info.
debugexec.threshold_default: <aqua><prefix>`threshold` = The percentage of plots you want to clear (100 clears 100% of plots so no point calibrating it.
debugexec.threshold_default_double: <aqua><green><prefix><threshold> <gray>= <gold>The percentage of plots you want to clear as a number between 0 - 100.
debugexec.mass_schematic_update_in_progr: <red><prefix>Cannot schedule mass schematic update. (Is one already in progress?)
expiry.expired_options_clicky:
<gold><num> <are_or_is> expired: <click:run_command:'<list_cmd>'><hover:show_text:'<list_cmd>'><gray><plot></hover></click>
<dark_gray> - <click:run_command:'<cmd_del>'><hover:show_text:'<cmd_del>'><gray>Delete this (<cmd_del>)</hover></click>
<dark_gray> - <click:run_command:'<cmd_keep_1d>'><hover:show_text:'<cmd_keep_1d>'><gray>Remind later (<cmd_keep_1d>)</hover></click>
<dark_gray> - <click:run_command:'<cmd_keep>'><hover:show_text:'<cmd_keep>'><gray>Keep this (<cmd_keep>)</hover></click>
<dark_gray> - <click:run_command:'<cmd_no_show_expir>'><hover:show_text:'<cmd_no_show_expir>'><gray>Don't show me this (<cmd_no_show_expir>)</hover></click>
debugimportworlds.world_container: <red><prefix>World container must be configured to be a separate directory to your base files.
schematics.schematic_road_created: <green><prefix>Saved new road schematic. To test the schematic, fly to a few other plots and run <command>.
debugroadregen.schematic:
<red><prefix>If no schematic is set, the following will not do anything.
<gray> - To set a schematic, stand in a plot and use <red><command>
debugroadregen.regenallroads_started: <prefix><green>PlotSquared will now attempt to generate roads based on your input. This may take a while.
errors.error_create: <red><prefix>An error occurred while creating the world: <gray><world>
errors.error_console: <red><prefix>An error occurred. See the console for more information.
errors.command_went_wrong: <red><prefix>Something went wrong when executing that command...
errors.not_in_cluster: <red><prefix>You must be within a plot cluster to perform that action.
errors.not_valid_world: <red><prefix>That is not a valid world (case sensitive).
errors.not_valid_plot_world: <aqua><prefix><value><red> is not a valid plot area (case sensitive).
errors.invalid_plot_world: <red><prefix>That is not a valid plot area (case sensitive).
errors.player_no_plots: <aqua><prefix>That player does not own any plots.
errors.wait_for_timer: <aqua><prefix>A set block timer is bound to either the current plot or you. Please wait for it to finish.
errors.tile_entity_cap_reached: <red><prefix>The total number of tile entities in this chunk may not exceed <gold><amount>.
error.plot_size_negative: <red><prefix>Error: An input lower or equal to 0 is invalid.
error.command_went_wrong: <red><prefix>Something went wrong when executing that command.
errors.deprecated_commands: <red><prefix>You are using a deprecated command scheduled for removal within the next major release of PlotSquared. Consider using the proper alternative: <red><gold><replacement>
debugpaste.latest_log: <red><file> is larger than <size>. Please reboot the server and submit a new paste.
debugpaste.skip_multiverse: <red>Skipping Multiverse <file> because it's not in use.
purge.confirm_purge_unknown_bg_enabled: <aqua><prefix>Background UUID caching is enabled. Unknown plot owners may be found using this!
purge.confirm_purge_unknown_bg_disabled: <aqua><prefix>Background UUID caching is disabled. Unknown plot owners may be found using this! Enable it in settings.yml.
players.fetching_player: <green><prefix>PlotSquared is attempting to find the specified player from your argument(s). This may take a while.
players.fetching_players_timeout: <red><prefix>The specified users did not exist in the cache and will be fetched in the background. Please wait a couple of minutes.
trim.trim_in_progress: <red><prefix>A world trim task is already in progress!
biome.need_biome: <red><prefix>You need to specify a valid biome.
biome.biome_set_to: <green><prefix>Plot biome set to <gray><value>. You may have to rejoin your game to see a change.
teleport.teleport_failed: <red><prefix>Teleportation cancelled due to movement or damage.
setblock.set_block_action_finished: <green><prefix>The last setblock action is now finished.
info.plot_unowned: <red><prefix>The current plot must have an owner to perform this action.
info.plot_info_hidden: <red><prefix>You cannot view the information about this plot.
info.plot_info_format:
<header>
<gold>ID: <gray><id>
Creation: <gray><creationdate>
Area: <gray><area>
Alias: <gray><alias>
Owner: <gray><owner>
Biome: <gray><biome>
Can Build: <gray><build>
Rating: <gray><rating>
Seen: <gray><seen>
Trusted: <gray><trusted>
Members: <gray><members>
Denied: <gray><denied>
Flags: <gray><flags>
Description: <gray><desc>
<footer>
info.plot_list_player_unknown: <hover:show_text:'<red>The owner of this plot is unknown'><white><unknown></hover>
info.plot_list_player_server: <hover:show_text:'<red>The plot is owned by the server'><white><server></hover>
chat.plot_chat_forced: <aqua><prefix>This world forces everyone to use plot chat.
deny.denied_added: <green><prefix>You successfully denied the player from this plot.
deny.no_enter: <red><prefix>You are denied from the plot <red><gold><plot><red> and therefore not allowed to enter.
deny.you_got_denied: <red><prefix>You are denied from the plot you were previously on, and got teleported to spawn.
kick.player_not_in_plot: <red><prefix>The player <gray><player> is not on this plot.
trusted.trusted_added: <green><prefix>You successfully trusted a user to the plot.
trusted.plot_removed_user: <red><prefix>Plot <plot> of which you were added to has been deleted due to owner inactivity.
member.player_not_removed: <aqua><prefix><player><red> is neither added, trusted or denied on the plot, thus doesn't need to be removed.
member.plot_cant_leave_owner: <red><prefix>You are the plot owner. You cannot leave this plot.
member.already_added: <aqua><prefix>That user is already added to that category: <player>
member.member_added: <green><prefix>That user can now build while the plot owner is online.
members.plot_max_members_added: <red><prefix>You are not allowed to add more than <gold><amount><red> players to this plot.
members.plot_max_members_trusted: <red><prefix>You are not allowed to trust more than <gold><amount><red> players to this plot.
members.plot_max_members_denied: <red><prefix>You are not allowed to deny more than <gold><amount><red> players from this plot.
members.not_added_trusted: <red><prefix>You must be added or trusted to the plot to run that command.
owner.now_owner: <green><prefix>You are now the plot owner of plot <plot>.
help.no_permission: <red><prefix>You have no permission to access commands of that sub category, hence you cannot access the help page.
backups.backup_impossible: <red><prefix>Backups are not enabled for this plot: <plot>.
backups.backup_automatic_failure: <red><prefix>The automatic backup process failed. Your pending action has been canceled. Reason: <gray><reason>
preset.preset_invalid: <red><prefix>Could not generate a pattern from that preset.
preset.title: Plot Components
preset.economy_disabled: <red><prefix>The component preset '<preset>' has a price set but economy is disabled.
single.single_area_missing_selection: <red><prefix>Error! You need to select a square region.
single.single_area_not_square: <red><prefix>Error! Your selection needs to be a square.
single.single_area_overlapping: <red><prefix>Error! Your selection overlaps with an existing plot area.
single.single_area_name_taken: <red><prefix>Error! The plot name is already taken.
single.single_area_failed_to_save: <red><prefix>Error! Failed to save the area schematic.
single.single_area_could_not_make_direct: <red><prefix>Error! Failed to create the schematic directory.
single.get_position: <green><prefix>Go to the first corner and use: <gray><command> to create position 1.
single.worldcreation_location:
<green><prefix>World creation settings may be stored in multiple locations:
<dark_gray> - <gray>bukkit.yml in your server's root folder.
<dark_gray> - <gray>PlotSquared's worlds.yml
<dark_gray> - <gray>Hyperverse's worlds.yml (or any world management plugin)
<dark_gray> - <red>Stop the server and delete it from these locations.
legacyconfig.legacy_config_found: <prefix><green>A legacy configuration file was detected. Conversion will be attempted.
legacyconfig.legacy_config_backup: <green><prefix>A copy of worlds.yml has been saved in the file worlds.yml.old.
legacyconfig.legacy_config_done: <prefix><green>The conversion has finished. PlotSquared will now be disabled and the new configuration file will be used at next startup. Please review the new worlds.yml file. Please note that schematics will not be converted, as we are now using WorldEdit to handle schematics. You need to re-generate the schematics.
legacyconfig.legacy_config_conversion_fa: <red><prefix>Failed to convert the legacy configuration file. See stack trace for information.
update.update_notification:
<green><prefix>There appears to be a PlotSquared update available!
<gold>You are running version <dark_aqua><p2version>
<gold>Latest version is <dark_aqua><spigotversion>
<gold>Download the update at: <click:open_url:<downloadurl>><downloadurl></click>
flag.not_valid_flag_suggested: <aqua><prefix>That is not a valid flag. Did you mean: <gold><value>
flag.flag_removed: <green><prefix>The flag <gold><flag><dark_aqua> with the value <gold><value><dark_aqua> has been removed successfully.
flag.flag_added: <green><prefix>The flag<gold> <flag><dark_aqua> with the value <gold><value><dark_aqua> has been added successfully.
flag.flag_list_see_info: <aqua><prefix>Click to view information about the flag.
flags.flag_description_entity_cap: <gray>Set to an integer value to limit the amount of entities on the plot.
flags.flag_description_explosion: <gray>Set to `true` to enable explosions in the plot, and `false` to disable them.
flags.flag_description_music: <gray>Set to a music disk ID (item name) to play the music disc inside the plot.
flags.flag_description_flight:
<gray>Set to `true` to enable flight within the plot when in survival or adventure mode
<gray>set to `default` to use the gamemode default, and `false` to disable flight entirely.
flags.flag_description_untrusted: <gray>Set to `false` to disallow untrusted players from visiting the plot.
flags.flag_description_deny_exit: <gray>Set to `true` to disallow players from exiting the plot.
flags.flag_description_chat: <gray>Set to `false` to prevent plot chat on the plot.
flags.flag_description_greeting: <gray>Message sent to players on plot entry.
flags.flag_description_farewell: <gray>Message sent to players when leaving the plot.
flags.flag_description_weather: <gray>Specifies the weather conditions inside the plot.
flags.flag_description_animal_attack: <gray>Set to `true` to allow animals to be attacked in the plot.
flags.flag_description_animal_cap: <gray>Set to an integer value to limit the amount of animals on the plot.
flags.flag_description_animal_interact: <gray>Set to `true` to allow animals to be interacted with in the plot.
flags.flag_description_block_burn: <gray>Set to `true` to allow blocks to burn within the plot.
flags.flag_description_block_ignition: <gray>Set to `false` to prevent blocks from igniting within the plot.
flags.flag_description_break: <gray>Define a list of materials players should be able to break even when they aren't added to the plot.
flags.flag_description_concrete_harden: <gray>Set to `false` to disable concrete powder forming to concrete with water.
flags.flag_description_device_interact: <gray>Set to `true` to allow devices to be interacted with in the plot.
flags.flag_description_disable_physics: <gray>Set to `true` to disable block physics in the plot.
flags.flag_description_drop_protection: <gray>Set to `true` to prevent dropped items from being picked up by non-members of the plot.
flags.flag_description_edit_sign: <gray>Set to `true` to allow editing signs in the plot.
flags.flag_description_feed: <gray>Specify an interval in seconds and an optional amount by which the players will be fed (amount is 1 by default).
flags.flag_description_fishing: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to use a fishing rod in the plot.
flags.flag_description_forcefield: <gray>Set to `true` to enable member forcefield in the plot.
flags.flag_description_grass_grow: <gray>Set to `false` to prevent grass from growing within the plot.
flags.flag_description_hanging_break: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to break hanging objects in the plot.
flags.flag_description_hanging_place: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to hang objects in the plot.
flags.flag_description_heal: <gray>Specify an interval in seconds and an optional amount by which the players will be healed (amount is 1 by default).
flags.flag_description_hostile_attack: <gray>Set to `true` to enable players to attack hostile mobs in the plot.
flags.flag_description_hostile_cap: <gray>Set to an integer value to limit the amount of hostile entities on the plot.
flags.flag_description_hostile_interact: <gray>Set to `true` to allow players to interact with hostile mobs in the plot.
flags.flag_description_ice_form: <gray>Set to `true` to allow ice to form in the plot.
flags.flag_description_ice_melt: <gray>Set to `false` to disable ice melting in the plot.
flags.flag_description_instabreak: <gray>Set to `true` to allow blocks to be instantaneously broken in survival mode.
flags.flag_description_interaction_inter: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to interact with interaction entities in the plot.
flags.flag_description_invincible: <gray>Set to `true` to prevent players from taking damage inside the plot.
flags.flag_description_item_drop: <gray>Set to `false` to prevent items from being dropped inside the plot.
flags.flag_description_kelp_grow: <gray>Set to `false` to prevent kelp from growing in the plot.
flags.flag_description_liquid_flow: <gray>Set to `false` to disable liquids from flowing within the plot.
flags.flag_description_misc_break: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to break miscellaneous items.
flags.flag_description_misc_cap: <gray>Set to an integer value to limit the amount of miscellaneous entities on the plot.
flags.flag_description_misc_interact: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to interact with miscellaneous items.
flags.flag_description_sculk_sensor_inte: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to interact with sculk sensors.
flags.flag_description_misc_place: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to place miscellaneous items.
flags.flag_description_mob_break: <gray>Set to `true` to allow mobs to break blocks within the plot.
flags.flag_description_mob_cap: <gray>Set to an integer value to limit the amount of mobs on the plot.
flags.flag_description_mob_place: <gray>Set to `true` to allow mobs to place blocks within the plot.
flags.flag_description_entity_change_blo: <gray>Set to `true` to allow entities to change blocks within the plot, if not covered by other flags.
flags.flag_description_mycel_grow: <gray>Set to `false` to prevent mycelium from growing in the plot.
flags.flag_description_notify_enter: <gray>Set to `true` to notify the plot owners when someone enters the plot.
flags.flag_description_notify_leave: <gray>Set to `true` to notify the plot owners when someone leaves the plot.
flags.flag_description_no_worldedit: <gray>Set to `true` to disable WorldEdit usage within the plot.
flags.flag_description_place: <gray>Define a list of materials players should be able to place in the plot.
flags.flag_description_player_interact: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to interact with players in the plot.
flags.flag_description_price: <gray>Set a price for a plot. Must be a positive decimal number.
flags.flag_description_projectile_change: <gray>Set to `true` to allow projectiles to change blocks (tnt, etc.) on the plot.
flags.flag_description_pve: <gray>Set to `true` to enable PVE inside the plot.
flags.flag_description_pvp: <gray>Set to `true` to enable PVP inside the plot.
flags.flag_description_redstone: <gray>Set to `false` to disable redstone in the plot.
flags.flag_description_server_plot: <gray>Set to `true` to turn the plot into a server plot. This is equivalent to setting the server as the plot owner.
flags.flag_description_snow_form: <gray>Set to `true` to allow snow to form within the plot.
flags.flag_description_copper_oxide: <gray>Set to `true` to allow copper to oxide within the plot.
flags.flag_description_snow_melt: <gray>Set to `true` to allow snow to melt within the plot.
flags.flag_description_soil_dry: <gray>Set to `true` to allow soil to dry within the plot.
flags.flag_description_coral_dry: <gray>Set to `true` to allow coral blocks to dry within the plot.
flags.flag_description_crop_grow: <gray>Set to `false` to disable crop growing on the plot
flags.flag_description_tamed_attack: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to attack tamed animals in the plot.
flags.flag_description_tamed_interact: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to interact with tamed animals in the plot.
flags.flag_description_time: <gray>Set the time in the plot to a fixed value.
flags.flag_description_tile_drop: <gray>Set to `false` to prevent blocks from dropping items in the plot.
flags.flag_description_titles: <gray>Set to `false` to disable plot titles. Can be set to: `none` (to inherit world settings), `true`, or `false`
flags.flag_description_title: <gray>Set the pop-up title's title and subtitle. Format: /plot flag set title "A title" "The subtitle"
flags.flag_description_use: <gray>Define a list of materials players should be able to interact with in the plot.
flags.flag_description_vehicle_break: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to break vehicles in the plot.
flags.flag_description_vehicle_cap: <gray>Set to an integer value to limit the amount of vehicles on the plot.
flags.flag_description_vehicle_place: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to place vehicles in the plot.
flags.flag_description_vehicle_use: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to use vehicles in the plot.
flags.flag_description_villager_interact: <gray>Set to `true` to allow guests to interact with villagers in the plot.
flags.flag_description_vine_grow: <gray>Set to `false` to prevent vines from growing within the plot.
flags.flag_description_deny_teleport: <gray>Deny a certain group from teleporting to the plot. Available groups: members, nonmembers, trusted, nontrusted, nonowners
flags.flag_description_guest_gamemode: <gray>Determines the guest gamemode in the plot.
flags.flag_description_blocked_cmds: <gray>A list of commands that are blocked in the plot.
flags.flag_description_keep: <gray>Prevents the plot from expiring. Can be set to: true, false, the number of milliseconds to keep the plot for or a timestamp (3w 2d 5h).
flags.flag_description_keep_inventory: <gray>Prevents players from dropping their items when they die inside the plot.
flags.flag_description_deny_portal_trave: <gray>Prevents players from travelling across dimensions by using portals.
flags.flag_description_deny_portals: <gray>Prevents players from creating portals of any kind.
flags.flag_description_prevent_creative_: <gray>Prevents people from copying item NBT data in the plot unless they're added as members.
flags.flag_description_leaf_decay: <gray>Set to `false` to prevent leaves from decaying.
flags.flag_description_projectiles: <gray>Prevents guests from shooting projectiles on the plot when set to false.
flags.flag_description_weaving_death_pla: <gray>Set to `false` to prevent spawning of cobwebs by the Weaving status effect on the death of an entity.
flags.flag_error_boolean: Flag value must be a boolean (true | false).
flags.flag_error_integer: Flag value must be a whole positive number.
flags.flag_error_keep: Flag value must be a timestamp or a boolean.
flags.flag_error_long: Flag value must be a whole positive number (large numbers allowed).
flags.flag_error_invalid_block: The provided value is not a valid block or block category.
flags.flag_error_double: Flag value must be a decimal number.
flags.flag_error_music: Flag value must be a valid music disc ID.
flags.flag_error_title: Flag value must be in the format <grey>"A title" "The subtitle"<red>.
flags.delaying_loading_area_flags: <aqua><prefix>Delaying loading flags for area `<dark_aqua><area><gray>` as WorldEdit is not initialised yet.
commands.description.add: <gray>Allow a user to build in a plot while the plot owner is online.
commands.description.buy: <gray>Buy the plot you are standing on.
commands.description.claim: <gray>Claim the current plot you are standing on.
commands.description.continue: <gray>Continue a plot that was previously marked as done.
commands.description.createroadschematic: <gray>Add a road schematic to your world using the roads around your current plot.
commands.description.debugloadtest: <gray>This debug command will force the reload of all plots in the database.
commands.description.debugpaste: <gray>Upload settings.yml, worlds.yml, your latest.log and Multiverse's worlds.yml (if being used) to https://athion.net/ISPaster/paste
commands.description.debugroadregen: <gray>Regenerate roads in the plot or region the user is, based on the road schematic.
commands.description.debugsavetest: <gray>This command will force the recreation of all plots in the database.
commands.description.deny: <gray>Deny a user from entering a plot.
commands.description.done: <gray>Continue a plot that was previously marked as done.
commands.description.leave: <gray>Remove yourself from being trusted or added of a plot.
commands.description.like: <gray>Like the plot you are standing on.
commands.description.merge: <gray>Merge the plot you are standing on with another plot.
commands.description.middle: <gray>Teleports you to the center of the plot.
commands.description.regenallroads: <gray>Regenerate all roads in the map using the set road schematic.
commands.description.trust: <gray>Allow a user to build in a plot and use WorldEdit while the plot owner is offline.
info.plot_info_categories.use_rating: <green><prefix>Categories:  <gray>members, alias, biome, seen, denied, flags, id, size, trusted, owner, rating
info.plot_info_categories.use_likes: <green><prefix>Categories:  <gray>members, alias, biome, seen, denied, flags, id, size, trusted, owner, likes
